alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Marathon; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 9:26PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Wood, southern Lincoln and western Marathon Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 925 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Owen to near Greenwood to 6 miles northwest of Black River Falls to near Trempealeau. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbotsford, New Wood Wildlife Area, Marshfield, Spencer, Merrill, Council Grounds State Park, Birch Trails Girl Scout Camp, Wausau and Rib Mountain. Stay tuned for later statements or possible warnings on this line of thunderstorms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
